reviews: Fits as expected. Maybe a touch small. I normally wear 32 waist 34 inseam so that’s what I ordered and the waist is snug but length is perfect so I’d recommend ordering up one size waist wise. Very comfortable tho and quality feels great! Have held up very well in the first couple weeks in a wet construction environment. They seem to dry out fairly quickly when the rain lets up. Not perfectly waterproof but very water resistant and for a pair of pants that as comfortable and breathable as these ones they exceeded my expectations for the price.
Very comfortable and great quality. Blew me away for the price!!
Great quality and really helps soothe and distract the baby!
Easy install and instantly improved the hard water and removed the chlorine smell from the city water system.
Arrived ahead of expected delivery date and product is perfect!
